Families nationwide are struggling with high deductibles and gaps in coverage, including #seniors. I‚Äôm proud to have introduced this bipartisan, commonsense fix to an unnecessary restriction on our seniors.

See my full statement here: https://bera.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/reps-bera-smith-introduce-bill-to-expand-health-savings-accounts-to¬†‚Ä¶

Health Savings Accounts would particularly help #seniors pay for services such as dental and vision care that is currently not covered under #Medicare, leading to a healthier and happier life, and a more dignified retirement

HSAs are a critical tool that many use before they are on #Medicare. 

Individuals can set aside pre-tax money to pay for out-of-pocket medical expenses such as copayments, deductibles, and also glasses, hearing aids, first aid supplies, and prescription drugs.

I just introduced bipartisan legislation along with @RepJasonSmith that would allow seniors covered under #Medicare to continue using or create new Health Savings Accounts, which is prohibited under current law. pic.twitter.com/50E7bJ4AfK
